title: Genoa Elegance near Portofino with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktails & Spa Access
description:
Tucked away in the leafy heart of Genoa, you'll find a five-star Meliá collection hotel dripping with Italian elegance. Moments from the city’s historic centre and a stone’s throw from the sparkling Italian Riviera, this refined retreat is your gateway to Cinque Terre’s pastel-hued villages and the glamour of Portofino.

From the moment you step into the sleek, art-adorned lobby, you’ll feel the city’s rich maritime heritage woven into every detail. Unwind in spacious, designer-styled rooms before indulging in Ligurian cuisine at Blue Lounge & Restaurant. The expansive YHI Wellness spa, complete with a heated indoor pool and Turkish bath, offers the perfect reset after a day of city exploration.

title: Genoa Luxury Close to City Centre with Restaurant
description: Enjoy modern luxury in the heart of Genoa at Holiday Inn Genoa City, an IHG Hotel. Set on the main road leading to the city centre, you will have easy access to Genoa's best sites - from the Romanesque Genoa Cathedral to 16th-century mansions and the modern quayside Aquarium of Genoa. After you're finished exploring, chill out at the hotel with an authentic lasagna with pesto and glass of Bianchetta wine  at the onsite Newport Restaurant.
location_description: Holiday Inn Genoa City, an IHG Hotel

title: Charming Palace Escape in the Heart of Genoa
description: Discover true elegance with a stay at the charming Hotel Bristol Palace, boasting an unbeatable location in the heart of Genoa and ranked in the top 10 hotels in Genoa by Tripadvisor. Spend evenings dining at Giotto Restaurant, where refined dining and Ligurian cuisine come together. For a romantic evening, step out onto the Open Terrace for cocktails under the stars. When you're ready to venture beyond the walls of your hotel, the wonders of Genoa await. Explore Doge’s Palace, the Carlo Felice Theatre and the most significant museums and historical buildings, located within easy walking distance.
offer_address: Via XX Settembre, 35, 16121 Genova GE, Italy
